creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: small rectangular pouch; multicolored cord with blue beaded tassel at top; eight multicolored yarn and bead tassels on sides and bottom; pouch woven with three stepped diamond motif designs in multicolors; gold metallic trims;(cresstitch)
dimension: 9 1/16 x 6 5/8 in. (23.02 x 16.83 cm) (without tassels or cord)
medium: Silk, cotton, beads, metallic threads; embroidery, braided cord
title: Bag
